  • Method Details

    • getFoodByName

      FoodDto getFoodByName(String food) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get food by its name.
      Parameters:
      food - the name of the food to be searched
      Returns:
      the existing food with the given name
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no food was found with the given name

    • getAllFoodsByRestaurant

      List<FoodDto> getAllFoodsByRestaurant(String restaurant)
      Get all the foods from the menu of a restaurant.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - the name of the restaurant whose menu is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the list of foods belonging to the given restaurant

    • getFoodsByRestaurantAndCategory

      List<FoodDto> getFoodsByRestaurantAndCategory(String restaurant, String category)
      Get all the foods of a restaurant belonging to the given category.
      Parameters:
      restaurant - the name of the restaurant whose foods are to be retrieved
      category - the name of the category to which the foods should belong
      Returns:
      the list of foods belonging to the given restaurant, filtered by the given category

    • getFoodByNameAndRestaurant

      FoodDto getFoodByNameAndRestaurant(String food, String restaurant) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Get food by its name and the name of the restaurant to which it belongs.
      Parameters:
      food - the name of the food to be retrieved
      restaurant - the name of the restaurant which contains the food in its menu
      Returns:
      the existing food with the given name and belonging to the given restaurant
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no food was found with the given name and belonging to the given restaurant

    • addFood

      void addFood(FoodDto foodDto) throws InvalidDataException, DuplicateDataException
      Add a new food to a restaurant's menu.
      Parameters:
      foodDto - the data related to the food to be added
      Throws:
      InvalidDataException - if the data related to the new food is invalid, ex. contains missing/null values
      DuplicateDataException - if the name of the new food is already taken

    • getAllFoodCategories

      List<String> getAllFoodCategories()
      Get all the available food categories.
      Returns:
      a list of all food categories
